name: TelePyroBot
description: PyroGram UserBot made by Skuzzy xD

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

HU_STRING_SESSION.description: Generate this value by running python3 GenerateStringSession.py locally

COMMAND_HAND_LER.description: specify command handler that should be used for the plugins

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Your App name of heroku, without this you won't be able to use the updater!

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Get a Heroku API key from http://dashboard.heroku.com/account, without this you won't be able to use the updater!

OWNER_ID.description: Goto @MissRose_Bot on Telegram and send /id to get your ID and fill it here.

OWNER_NAME.description: Name which you would like to appear when 'alive' or 'start' commands are used.

PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.description: A group where all your userbot messages will be logged! Make a new group and add @MissRose_Bot in it, then do /id, copy and paste that number here.

PM_PERMIT.description: Weather to send the message, `master is unavailable, would contact you shortly`

REMBG_API_KEY.description: Ised for removeng plugins to work
